```{=html}
<section>
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 150 55">
  <defs>
  <g id="logo">
    <circle cx="50" cy="26" r="15" fill="var(--pincolor)"  stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="50" cy="49.5" r="48" fill="none" stroke="var(--textcolor)" stroke-width="12"/>
    <path d="M49,44 L 50,93 L 51,44" fill="black"/>
  </g>
  <g id="name">
    <text width="500" x="0" y="20" fill="var(--textcolor)"  font-family = "Karla" font-weight="400">
        PINP
    </text>
    <use x="360" y="100" xlink:href="#logo" transform = "scale(0.1)";/>
    <text width="500" x="47" y="20" fill="var(--textcolor)"  font-family = "Karla" font-weight="400">
        INT
    </text>
  </g>
  <g id="full-logo">
  <use x="0" y="0" xlink:href="#name"/>
    <text width="500" x="0" y="35"  fill = "var(--pincolor)" font-family = "Karla" font-weight="300">
        STRATEGIES
    </text>
  </g>
  </defs>
  <use xlink:href="#full-logo" transform = "scale(1.5)">
</svg>
</section>
<h2>Insights, Efficiency and Innovation</h2>
```
